data.eml:eml: Description of three new species of Ampelisca (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Ampeliscidae) from Southwestern Atlantic, with a key of the genus for Brazilian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valério-Berardo, Maria Teresa (2007): Description of three new species of Ampelisca (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Ampeliscidae) from Southwestern Atlantic, with a key of the genus for Brazilian species. Zootaxa 1626: 25-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179283
